website_summaries.verdict: Outdoorsy people will surely find the Berghaus Expeditor Trek 2.0 as an interesting boot as it offers comfort out of the box, fits well, and provides sufficient ankle support. These characteristics play a great role in the success of a hike. However, it seems that its lacing system was its weak point. By and large, with its reconcilable mishaps, the Expeditor Trek 2.0 still has a lot of advantages worth looking into.
pros: Almost all of those who bought the Berghaus Expeditor Trek 2.0 mentioned that it was extremely comfortable
This watertight hiker received compliments from the majority for its effective protection against water intrusion
According to some wearers, it has a very good fit
The Berghaus Expeditor Trek 2.0 was commended for its superb grip on various ground surfaces
More than a handful stated that it provided adequate ankle support
Its nil requirement of a break-in period surprised a lot of owners
Hordes of verified purchasers commented that the Expeditor Trek 2.0 was a well-made boot
cons: A very few were frustrated because the laces were too thin
A couple of online buyers mentioned that the lacing system of the Expeditor Trek 2.0 from Berghaus takes time getting used to

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL WATERPROOF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Husband in March to use at his Hillwalking Group. All seemed fine until today, when travelling over terrain and conditions that the boots were designed for, he has advised me that after a slightly heavier downpour than usual his boots became rapidly saturated making his journey pretty arduous to say the least! As I am extremely disappointed with this occurring I will be contacting the seller to advise of this situation and hopefully this will be resolved to allow me to review once more a lot more favourably!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA M

customer_reviews.title: Ok but i'll need to work them in before 100% happy wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Worn these straight out the box on a 10 mile hike, got a size 8.5 which is what i normally wear but found they were tight across the widest part of my foot. I persisted until i finished the walk but could not wear them the next day for another 10 miles. Still got them but will need the break them in before the next hike. They are light and generally comfortable, (apart from my issue) they will be worn again by me so happy with the buy👍 i always look for a boot with a wide fit.. thought these might do it... Not quite.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: These boots have arrived today and I have to say, they are even better looking than I thought they’d be, I know that’s not top priority for some. I haven’t worn them for a long walk yet but they seemed perfectly comfy on a short walk not even wearing them in. Not certain how water resident they will be as I have never owned a pair of boots that actually could keep water out, fingers crossed 🤞🏻 Finally, they fit perfectly, I’d get your usual size for a boot if you order 👍🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 18 Month Review
customer_reviews.text: These boots are still going strong after 18 months use. I use them year round, from casual walks to multi day hikes in the UK national parks. They have performed well in various conditions on wet rocks and boggy marshes - always had dry feet and no blisters and the seams and sole are all still intact For the price (They were 75 quid at the time) They have been excellent
customer_reviews.author: Duffman

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof! Not water resistant!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are neither waterproof or water resistant ! What a waste of money. Looking good and tight fit. I have expected more from Berghaus. No protective spray can help ... just not suitable for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Andreas Russ

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality Product than previous versions
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 pairs of the "same" boots however in comparing them I can see that each version has been produced with a slightly lower quality than the previous version. They remain comfortable however the thickness of the padding on the tongue and around the ankle, for example, has gone much thinner than the previous version of the boot
customer_reviews.author: Mr James Liptrot

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Footwear
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these Berghaus Waterproof Walking Boots my first pair lasted 10 years. These are the same great quality, fit very comfortable, and Amazons price was the best with free prime delivery. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Gas

customer_reviews.title: Let water in
customer_reviews.text: Sadly once the winter comes, the water also comes in this boot, after walking through long grass for 30 mins , both my feet were soaked inside this boot. Such a shame as these boots fit lovely and are so comfy to walk in. Refund from Amazon no problem, but i do wonder why this top end boot boot lets water in after only 6 months light usage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable straight out of the box and easy walking on rough tracks. Waterproof so far. Made in Cambodia
customer_reviews.author: Mr J T Cox

customer_reviews.title: comfort straight from the box
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand for many years due to them being comfortable out of the box with no need to break in and being totally waterproof.Due to the guarantee of lifetime care can be bought without any concerns regarding fitment
customer_reviews.author: l j stanfordmettis

customer_reviews.title: Could provide better ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but not really heavy duty walking boots, fine for occasional long distance walking but not really suitable for heavy use. The sides are not really high enough to provide ankle support, but good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: malbro

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit at all!
customer_reviews.text: Despite always using same size this one was no way close to fitting my feet, uncomfortable and looked better online! sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: alraune666

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The left boot was too tight, squashing my toe's . Returned them to Amazon and will order a size 9.5 instead of 9
customer_reviews.author: raymond griffiths

customer_reviews.title: 6 month round the world trip and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and travelled around the world over six months. Mud, rain, sand and dust. Perfect for hiking and urban environments and comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Craddy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous pairs
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth pair of Berghaus expeditor over 20 years. I’m not happy with these as I can’t get these broken in. The heal cuff stitching and cuffs are rubbing and the laces are slipping. Poor in comparison to previous.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Marian J Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Had to return, one of the lace lug came unstitched.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the boots in good time and fit as expected. Upon tiring the laces up for the first time one of the lace lugs came unstitched, I am returing the boots. I'll be looking for a pair of boots with metal lace lugs/tidies.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for explorer treks
customer_reviews.text: Good solid comfortable walking boots to replace elderly explorer boots. Similar colourway, fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good comfy boots.
customer_reviews.text: Im no expert with walking boots, i've not had many pairs but these are by far the best most comfy boots i've owned. Fully water proof, from what i've put them through at least. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a more expensive pair of Berghaus boots and they wore out. gave these a try, really comfortable and light, not as solid as the more expensive ones but really pleased up to now
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Have been on a few walks since getting these for Christmas and very happy with them. Comfortable over long distance, so far my feet haven’t got wet. Look after these and they will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Dale Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: There’s are really comfy and light weight boots only done a few miles in them but so far great. Still to try in the wet
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. They fit very well and I like the look of them
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof at all if it rains you feet get wet not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: gggccc

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Boots are not waterproof! First time worn boots in wet weather,only walked thru wet grass very wet feet
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Recipient loves them, a good fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Hardwearing
customer_reviews.text: I find them brilliant for taking the dog out in the fields
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from the box. Just unwrapped them and walked a brisk five miles.
customer_reviews.author: R.Haines

customer_reviews.title: 5 star worthy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from the first wear. As usual with Berghaus, excellent bit of kit which does exactly as you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Bakers

customer_reviews.title: They are what it says in the advert.
customer_reviews.text: We’re the same as image in advert ,fit was good these berghaus boots were to replace old ones very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight and warm. These boots fit as expected and are waterproof too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the perfect work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect snug fit as per usual More colour range But still love it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jason Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable but a little snug
customer_reviews.text: Light, excellent quality as you would expect of Berghaus and look good too. Quite a snug fit if you are wanting to wear hiking socks I would suggest a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: C J Stott

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: The shoes didn’t fit as expected. It was too large for my feet and Amazon won’t exchange to a smaller size after buying on lower price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery well made product, lightweight and strong, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Matthews

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Berghaus size 9 boots 4 years ago and they were a perfect fit and great. That's why I chose Berghaus size 9 this time. Sadly these boots are smaller, which I assume is some cost cutting exercise. It's time to look at another brand I think.
customer_reviews.author: SpringBrucesteen

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Expeditor Trek 2.0 Waterproof Walking Boots
product_meta.description: The benefits just keep stacking up with the new look expeditor Trek 2.0. Hardwearing and durable, supple suede offers feet great moveability whilst the aq waterproof lining keeps them dry all day long. Don’t worry about breathability. A strong mesh threaded through the upper also helps ventilate feet, while a great grip from the opti-stud outsole gives you confidence even on tricky terrain. For everyday walking, these are a great looking, great performing boot.
feature_bullets: Light and reliable, this robust waterproof hiking boot makes everyday trekking a breeze
